heading: HB03066
0: AN ACT REPEALING PROHIBITION FOR APPOINTMENT OF NAVAL STATE UNIVERSITY PRESIDENT, PROVIDED THAT NO PRIVATE SECTOR REPRESENTATIVE SHALL BE APPOINTED AS UNIVERSITY PRESIDENT IF HE/SHE IS RELATED BY CONSANGUINITY OR AFFINITY UP TO THE THIRD CIVIL DEGREE TO ANY INCUMBENT LOCAL OR NATIONAL OFFICIAL, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTION 9 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9718, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS CONVERSION OF NAVAL INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY TO NAVAL STATE UNIVERSITY, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act RA11170 enacted on 2019-01-03 Substituted by HB06065
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03066
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REPEALING PROHIBITION FOR APPOINTMENT OF NAVAL STATE UNIVERSITY PRESIDENT, PROVIDED THAT NO PRIVATE SECTOR REPRESENTATIVE SHALL BE APPOINTED AS UNIVERSITY PRESIDENT IF HE/SHE IS RELATED BY CONSANGUINITY OR AFFINITY UP TO THE THIRD CIVIL DEGREE TO ANY INCUMBENT LOCAL OR NATIONAL OFFICIAL, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTION 9 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9718, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS CONVERSION OF NAVAL INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY TO NAVAL STATE UNIVERSITY, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ESPINA, ROGELIO J. M.D.
DATE FILED : 2016-08-17
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Approved by the Committee on 2017-03-06
MOTHER BILL: HB06065
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION ON 2016-08-24
